author: cnbc.com
title: PDF Solutions reports 4Q loss
text:
SAN JOSE, Calif. (AP) _ PDF Solutions Inc. (PDFS) on Thursday reported a fourth-quarter loss of $2.6 million, after reporting a profit in the same period a year earlier.
On a per-share basis, the San Jose, California-based company said it had a loss of 8 cents. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs and stock option expense, came to 13   surpassed Wall   three   for earnings of 11 cents per share.
The provider of software and services for semiconductor makers posted revenue of $26.8 million in the period, also topping Street forecasts. Three analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $26.5 million.
  a loss of $1.3 million, or 4 cents per share, swinging to a loss in the period. Revenue was reported as $101.9 million.
PDF Solutions shares have declined 13   In the final minutes of trading on Thursday, shares hit $13.61, a drop of 40 percent in the last 12 months.
